bike.description: OCLV® HC Carbon sandwiches a honeycomb of Nomex® between layers of OCLV Carbon for incredible stiffness with less weight - just 3 lbs. Pro Race geometry improves handling at high speeds.

components.description: RockShox SID Team, Dual Air, external rebound control, pure damping w/Climb It control, All Travel 63/80mm

Bontrager Race Lite Tubeless: Durable and World Class fast; Uses a regular tire/tube, or tubeless tires for increased control and reduced flats; Swiss-made hubs; Race Lite skewers; 710 g, 24h front/975 g, 28h rear
AHS 1-1/8" alloy cups, semi cartridge, sealed
